about_the_game:
License To Clone is a wild west science fantasy (aka weird west) RPG with a populace made up of factory bred clones, including the player themselves.

In the demo game, you will find yourself starting out within the labs of Landzo - as a failed and mutated clone you'll first escape the labs and then find yourself in the open world.

Features

- Start as Mutant Clone only (much more species in full game)

- Unlock starting mutations, abilities and more

- Experience 1/4th of the map, the main desert area

- One single starting scenario (more in full game)

The world you find yourself in already has a lot of history that has taken place and influenced the world you exist in today. The planet was colonized by the Sincorp organisation 100 years ago with but a handful of humans known as "founders" their robot assistants and the technology to clone a workforce to build a new utopia. 

Begin helping Bob with extracting DNA Samples from all species types, while picking up side quests along the way.

The rest of the world outside of the desert is available to you in the demo but will be empty and devoid of life.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains cartoon violence where the player is able to attack other humanoids, robots and fantasy animals. The game will display pools of blood around the characters although this can be disabled in the settings menu.

detailed_description:
License To Clone is a wild west science fantasy (aka weird west) RPG with a populace made up of factory bred clones, including the player themselves.

In the demo game, you will find yourself starting out within the labs of Landzo - as a failed and mutated clone you'll first escape the labs and then find yourself in the open world.

The world you find yourself in already has a lot of history that has taken place and influenced the world you exist in today. The planet was colonized by the Sincorp organisation 100 years ago with but a handful of humans known as "founders" their robot assistants and the technology to clone a workforce to build a new utopia. 

Begin helping Bob with extracting DNA Samples from all species types, while picking up side quests along the way.

name: License To Clone Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4160 (dual-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 440 (1 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 6570 (1 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7750 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Demo for License to Clone the Open World Survival RPG
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
